description.english: As the candle of life flickers out, may the gentle moonlight illuminate your soul's new journey, ushering you into boundless light and hope, embarking on a glorious rebirth
description.schinese: 当生命之烛摇曳熄灭，愿温柔的月光照亮你灵魂的新旅程，引领你步入无尽的光明与希望，踏上辉煌的重生之路

description.english: From the summit, one can see all mountains below, and justice prevails!
description.schinese: 会当凌绝顶，一览众山小，正义必胜！

description.english: Reason burns beneath the illusory blazing sun, and before your eyes, a female knight stands facing away from the light. Amidst the glow, she guides your soul into the boundless depths of darkness
description.schinese: 理性在虚幻的烈日下燃烧，你的眼前，一位女骑士背对着光芒站立。在光芒之中，她引领你的灵魂步入无尽的黑暗深渊

description.english: The birth of a demon is a dark and twisted journey, intertwined with pain, despair, and hatred. It stems from the darkest recesses of humanity's soul, where this force gestates and grows, eventually daring to challenge the rules and order of the world, acting with reckless abandon and without regard. It destroys beauty, tramples upon the dignity of life, casting the entire world into darkness and fear. Yet, it remains merely a tool in the hands of some, a tool of domination
description.schinese: 恶魔的诞生是一场黑暗而扭曲的旅程，伴随着痛苦、绝望和仇恨。它源自人性最深处的黑暗角落，在那里孕育并成长，最终敢于挑战世界的规则和秩序，肆意妄为，不顾一切。它摧毁美好，践踏生命的尊严，将整个世界笼罩在黑暗和恐惧之中。然而，它也只是某些人手中的工具，一个统治的工具

description.english: The judgement has concluded, and most have received their desired outcomes, with discordant notes in the proceedings overlooked by design. Who cares, really?
description.schinese: 审判已结束，大多数人得到了他们想要的结果，而过程中不和谐的声音则被故意忽视。谁真的在乎呢？

description.english: In a secluded corner of the world, stands a majestic tower, a symbol of justice and equality. This tower pierces the clouds, its body adorned with intricate carvings that embody bravery and wisdom. Within its walls, people respect and support each other, fostering a unique societal atmosphere. In its halls, individuals share their wisdom and experiences, collectively striving for the truth. From its summit, they gaze out, examining the world with a broader perspective. This tower is not merely a physical structure; it is a spiritual emblem, representing humanity's pursuit and reverence for courage, wisdom, and justice
description.schinese: 在世界的一隅，矗立着一座雄伟的塔，象征着正义与平等。这座塔刺破云霄，其身上雕刻着精美的图案，体现了勇敢与智慧。在塔内，人们相互尊重和支持，营造出独特的社会氛围。在塔的大厅里，人们分享着他们的智慧和经验，共同追求真理。从塔顶眺望，他们拥有更广阔的视野来审视这个世界。这座塔不仅仅是一座物理建筑，更是一个精神象征，代表着人类对勇气、智慧和正义的追求与崇敬

description.english: After the tower's collapse, a desolate landscape of ruins unfolds before the eyes. The former grandeur and glory vanish in an instant, replaced by crumbling walls and scattered rubble
description.schinese: 塔崩塌后，眼前展开的是一片废墟的荒凉景象。昔日的辉煌与荣耀瞬间消失，取而代之的是崩塌的墙壁和散落的碎石

description.english: The light of the lantern dims, perhaps even extinguished, leaving his figure more frail and lost in the darkness
description.schinese: 灯笼的光芒渐渐暗淡，或许已经熄灭，使他的身影在黑暗中显得更加脆弱和迷失

description.english: Every time their eyes meet, it's like two stars reflecting each other in the night sky. No matter what difficulties and challenges they face, they always support and confront them together. They believe in and encourage each other, giving each other endless strength in times of adversity
description.schinese: 每次他们的目光相遇，都像是夜空中两颗星星相互映照。无论面对什么困难和挑战，他们都相互支持和面对。他们相互信任和鼓励，在逆境中给予彼此无尽的力量

description.english: Two meteors meeting in the night sky are like two souls relentlessly toyed with by fate, briefly and dazzlingly illuminating each other's world, only to fade into darkness eventually
description.schinese: 夜空中相遇的两颗流星，如同被命运无情玩弄的两个灵魂，短暂而耀眼地照亮彼此的世界，最终却消逝于黑暗之中

description.english: In the depths of the night sky, shines a unique star, a dazzling jewel that illuminates the heavens. This star boasts not only a captivating appearance but also boundless charm and power. Like an eternal beacon, it guides those lost in darkness, offering solace and direction. Whenever people feel lost or helpless, gazing up at this star brings a sense of warmth, as if it whispers of light and hope
description.schinese: 在夜空的深处，闪耀着一颗独特的星星，它像一颗璀璨的宝石照亮着天际。这颗星星不仅外表迷人，还蕴含着无尽的魅力和力量。它像一座永恒的灯塔，为迷失在黑暗中的人们指引方向，带来安慰和希望。每当人们感到迷茫或无助时，抬头仰望这颗星星，都会感受到一种温暖，仿佛它在轻声细语着光明与希望

description.english: Yet, the once radiant stars now glimmer faintly, shrouded by an invisible gloom that obscures their original brilliance
description.schinese: 然而，曾经璀璨的星辰如今却黯淡无光，被无形的阴霾笼罩，遮蔽了它们原有的光辉

description.english: The Death figure wears a deep black robe, blending into the endless night. His face is pale yet exquisite, like a sculpture, but his eyes are as deep as abysses, revealing a detachment and wisdom beyond the mortal realm. His steps are light and steady, each measuring the length of life
description.schinese: 死神身着一袭深黑长袍，融入无尽的夜色之中。他的面容苍白而精致，宛如雕塑，但双眼却深邃如渊，透露出超脱尘世的冷漠与智慧。他的步伐轻盈而稳健，每一步都丈量着生命的长度

description.english: No one shows sympathy or pity for the Hanged Man's suffering. He seems isolated in a desolate corner, neglected by all. His sacrifice appears meaningless, even foolish, in the eyes of the world
description.schinese: 无人对绞刑者的苦难表示同情或怜悯。他似乎在荒凉的角落里被孤立，被所有人忽视。他的牺牲在世人眼中显得毫无意义，甚至愚蠢

description.english: This world is indeed brimming with endless wonders and limitless possibilities. From the vast expanse of the universe's stars to the profound depths of the ocean floor, every corner holds secrets of life and nature's marvels. As an explorer of this world, you have faced countless challenges and hardships, but these trials have forged your will. Your efforts and perseverance have finally borne fruit. Now, the world seems to embrace you, inviting you to explore and savor its beauty and miracles. With the world's infinite possibilities at your fingertips, may you continue to forge ahead, creating your own brilliance
description.schinese: 这个世界确实充满了无尽的奇迹和无限的可能性。从宇宙星辰的广阔无垠到海底深处的深邃莫测，每一个角落都蕴藏着生命和自然的奥秘。作为这个世界的探索者，你面临了无数的挑战和艰辛，但这些考验铸就了你的意志。你的努力和坚持终于结出了果实。现在，世界似乎拥抱了你，邀请你去探索和品味它的美丽与奇迹。随着世界无限的可能性在你指尖展开，愿你继续勇往直前，创造自己的辉煌

description.english: Pure strength not only demonstrates the extraordinary prowess of its bearer but also underscores their profound wisdom. They know how to wield this power wisely, unleashing it like a thunderbolt at crucial moments, delivering an inescapable fatal blow to the enemy
description.schinese: 纯粹的力量不仅展现了其拥有者非凡的实力，也突显了他们的深邃智慧。他们知道如何明智地运用这股力量，在关键时刻如闪电般释放，给予敌人无法逃脱的致命一击

description.english: Blind faith in strength, devoid of the balance and assistance of other talents, can easily lead one into reckless confidence and arrogance
description.schinese: 盲目地相信力量，缺乏其他才能的平衡和辅助，很容易让人陷入鲁莽的自信和傲慢之中

description.english: The supreme ruler of the new country has won the respect of the people with his outstanding leadership and wisdom. He is dedicated to the development of economy, education, and technology, creating a peaceful and prosperous society for the people. His decisions are fair and transparent, demonstrating his concern and responsibility for the well-being of the people. On the international stage, he has won respect and friendship for his country with his excellent diplomatic skills, making him the pride of the people
description.schinese: 新国家的至高无上的统治者以其卓越的领导力和智慧赢得了人民的尊敬。他致力于经济、教育和技术的发展，为人民创造了一个和平繁荣的社会。他的决策公正透明，展现了他对人民福祉的关心和责任感。在国际舞台上，他以出色的外交技巧为国家赢得了尊重和友谊，成为人民的骄傲

description.english: The regicide was brave and resolute, taking lives but failing to shake the rotten system. The passage of life left only traces of blood and tears, without touching the root of institutional change. His solitary bravery did not lead to a trend of breaking with the past and making a fresh start, and the drawbacks of the system remained deeply entrenched
description.schinese: 弑君者勇敢而果断，夺取了生命却未能撼动腐朽的制度。生命的流逝只留下了血与泪的痕迹，却未能触及制度变革的根源。他孤独的勇敢并未引领打破过去、重新开始的趋势，制度的弊端依然根深蒂固

description.english: The Wheel of Fortune, in its eternal rotation, is filled with relentless tricks and helpless turns. It can cast one from the pinnacle into the abyss, yet also grant a glimmer of hope amidst despair. This unpredictable cycle becomes the cruelest trial of life
description.schinese: 命运之轮在永恒的旋转中充满了无情的诡计和无奈的转折。它能将一个人从巅峰抛入深渊，也能在绝望中给予一丝希望。这个不可预测的循环成为了生命中最残酷的考验

description.english: The towering chariot, its armor glinting, descends upon the battlefield like a deity of protection. Its impenetrable armor serves as a fortress, guarding the brave warriors within. Its wheels roll like thunder, exuding an unparalleled power. It is a sanctuary for warriors, a guarantee of victory, safeguarding honor and conviction
description.schinese: 高耸的战车，盔甲闪耀，如同保护神一般降临战场。它坚不可摧的盔甲是一座堡垒，守护着里面的勇士。车轮滚滚如雷，散发出无与伦比的力量。它是战士们的圣地，是胜利的保证，守护着荣誉和信念

description.english: The flag on the chariot flaps in the wind, yet it seems so lonely and desolate. Once so proud and free, it is now but a puppet, driven by another's will, unable to steer its own course
description.schinese: 战车上的旗帜在风中飘扬，却显得如此孤独和荒凉。它曾如此骄傲和自由，现在却只是一个傀儡，受他人意志驱使，无法掌握自己的方向
